Title: Unspecified
Description: Fuel that cannot be associated with any of available fuel codes.

Title: Renewable solid unspecified
Description: Fuel produced in a solid form from renewable resources that cannot be associated with any of available renewable solid fuel codes.

Title: Renewable solid municipal waste
Description: Solid waste of biological material produced by households, hospitals and the tertiary sector (in general all waste that resembles household waste).

Title: Renewable solid industrial and commercial waste
Description: Solid waste generated by businesses, production units, bureaus and offices.

Title: Renewable solid wood
Description: S  olid wood energy resource.

Title: Renewable solid animal fats
Description: Solid animal fats energy resource.

Title: Renewable solid biomass from agriculture
Description: Solid by-products and residues from agriculture.

Title: Renewable liquid unspecified
Description: Fuel produced in form of liquid from renewable resources that cannot be associated with any of available renewable liquid fuel codes.

Title: Renewable liquid municipal biodegradable waste
Description: Liquid municipal waste capable of undergoing anaerobic or aerobic decomposition.

Title: Renewable liquid black liquor
Description: Alkaline-spent liquor obtained from the digesters during the production of sulphate or soda pulp.

Title: Renewable liquid pure plant oil
Description: Oil produced from plants, mainly from rapeseed and sunflower crops.

Title: Renewable liquid waste plant oil
Description: Oil produced from plants that is no longer usable for its originally intended purpose.

Title: Renewable liquid refined vegetable oil
Description: Oil produced from plants and transformed into fuel by refining process (hydrocracking or hydrogenation).

Title: Renewable gaseous unspecified
Description: Fuel produced in form of gas from renewable resources that cannot be associated with any of available renewable gaseous fuel codes.

Title: Renewable gaseous landfill gas
Description: Gas produced by digestion of land filled waste.

Title: Renewable gaseous sewage gas
Description: Gas produced from the anaerobic fermentation of sewage sludge.

Title: Renewable gaseous agricultural gas
Description: Gas produced from agricultural processes.

Title: Renewable gaseous gas from organic waste digestion
Description: Gas produced by anaerobic digestion process from organic waste.

Title: Renewable gaseous process gas
Description: Gas produced by an industrial process as a consequence.

Title: Renewable gaseous other biogenic sources
Description: Gas produced by form of biogenic resource transformation that cannot be associated with any of available renewable gaseous fuel codes that use biogenic energy resource.

Title: Renewable heating and cooling solar
Description: Sunlight energy source.

Title: Renewable heating and cooling geothermal
Description: Geothermal energy source.

Title: Renewable heating and cooling aerothermal
Description: Thermal energy obtained from air.

Title: Renewable heating and cooling hydrothermal
Description: Thermal energy obtained from large body of water.

Title: Renewable heating and cooling process heat
Description: Thermal energy obtained from process heat.

Title: Renewable mechanical unspecified
Description: Energy from renewable resource transformed into mechanical energy that cannot be associated with any of available renewable mechanical fuel codes.

Title: Renewable mechanical wind
Description: Kinetic energy of wind transformed into mechanical energy.

Title: Renewable mechanical hydro and marine
Description: Falling or flowing water energy or energy derived from tidal movement, wave motion or ocean current.

Title: Fossil unspecified
Description: Unspecified fossil energy source.

Title: Fossil solid unspecified
Description: Unspecified fossil solid energy source.

Title: Fossil solid hard coal
Description: Hard coal solid fossil energy source. This includes Anthracite, Bituminous coal, Coking coal, Coke-oven coke and Lignite coke.

Title: Fossil solid brown coal
Description: Brown coal solid fossil energy source. This includes Sub-bituminous coal, Lignite, Brown coal briquette and Peat briquette.

Title: Fossil solid peat
Description: Solid fossil peat energy source.

Title: Fossil solid municipal waste
Description: Solid fossil municipal waste energy source.

Title: Fossil solid industrial and commercial waste
Description: Solid fossil industrial and commercial waste energy source.

Title: Fossil liquid unspecified
Description: Unspecified fossil liquid energy source.

Title: Fossil liquid crude oil
Description: Liquid crude oil fossil energy source. This includes shale oil or other types.

Title: Fossil liquid natural gas liquids (NGL)
Description: Liquid natural gas liquids (NGL) fossil energy source.

Title: Fossil liquid petroleum products
Description: Liquid petroleum products energy source. This includes Ethane,Naphtha, Aviation gasoline , Motor gasoline, Aviation turbine fuel,Other kerosene,Gas/diesel oil , Fuel oil, low sulphur ,Fuel oil, high sulphur ,Liquid Petroleum Gas , Orimulsion , Bitumen ,Lubricants ,Petroleum coke , Refinery Feedstock.

Title: Fossil gaseous unspecified
Description: Unspecified fossil gaseous energy source.

Title: Fossil gaseous natural gas
Description: Fossil gaseous natural gas energy source.

Title: Fossil gaseous coal-derived gas
Description: Fossil gaseous coal-derived gas energy source. This includes Blast furnace gas,Coke-oven gas or other types.

Title: Fossil gaseous petroleum products
Description: Fossil gaseous petroleum products energy source. This includes Propane, Butane, Refinery gas, Chemical waste gas or other types.

Title: Fossil gaseous municipal gas plant
Description: Fossil gaseous municipal gas plant energy source.

Title: Fossil gaseous process gas
Description: Fossil gaseous process gas energy source. This includes Carbon monoxide,  Methane , Hydrogen (fossil sourced) ,Phosphor gas ,Oxy gas and other types.

Title: Fossil heat unspecified
Description: Unspecified fossil heat energy source.

Title: Fossil heat process heat
Description: Fossil process heat energy source.

Title: Nuclear solid radioactive fuel
Description: Solid Nuclear radioactive energy source. This includes UOX, AGR, MOX or other types.

Title: Gas synthesis unspecified
Description: Unspecified gas synthesis energy source.

Title: Gas synthesis furnace gas
Description: Gas synthesis from furnace gas energy source.

Title: Waste heat and cold unspecified
Description: Unspecified Waste heat and cold energy source.

Title: Waste heat and cold By-product in industrial installation
Description: Waste heat and cold from by-product in industrial installation energy source.

Title: Waste heat and cold By-product in power generation
Description: Waste heat and cold from by-product in power generation energy source.

Title: Waste heat and cold By-product in tertiary sector
Description: Waste heat and cold from by-product in tertiary sector energy source.

Title: Hydrogen
Description: Hydrogen energy source.
